name: Move (technical_keys)
description:
This is you:

You’re trying to get these:

To unlock this:

(There will always be a cyan line pointing to your next target)

You can jump with (A button, left click, space) and move to these:

Green is your current target, yellow is in range, and black is out of range.

(You can aim using the movement controls (left analog, mouse move, wasd) and camera (right analog, mouse move, ijkl))

Gamepad recommended

Fullscreen recommended
